CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 27, 1954, pg. 13 reads: "The Glamorous Cotillion - Scenes from the third annual debutante Cotillion given by Pittsburgh AKAs include...Bottom right, the 1953 king and queen await the approach of the new rulers of the debutante set, flanked by flower girls (left to right) Sylvia Page, Pamela Ann McGruder, left: Carolyn Anderson and Adoria Woodruff, right. The pages Charles Fountain and Samuel Rhyne Jr. are seated in front. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: "Queen" Burnistine McClaney and "King" Ronald Dent of 1953, crowning Jacqueline Lewis and Lawrence Stout, with flower girls Sylvia Page, Pamela Ann McGruder on right, gathered in Syria Mosque for Alpha Kappa Alpha's 1954 Cotillion
